page.title: 08ISLAND DOCTOR
page.content:
The local doctor,{Dr. Ewen,}lives at Flebister. The house has recently been renovated. There is a{surgery}in the house and as there are no dispensing chemists on the island a{dispensary}is also included in the arrangement of rooms. There is also a waiting room. The doctor holds consultations on weekdays from 9-10am and, in addition, there are evening consultations on Tuesdays and Thursdays between 5.30 and 6.00pm.
His assistant is{Mrs. Katherine {Munro,}who helps to issue medicines. she works every day except Saturday.
The doctor, being a G.P., pays periodic visits to patients in their homes.
